mapper.select: SELECT f.fans_id AS id, f.fans_name AS username, i.introduction AS introduction, u.image AS avatar, CASE WHEN fw.follow_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS concerned FROM ap_user_fan f LEFT JOIN ap_user_info i ON i.user_id = f.fans_id LEFT JOIN ap_user u ON u.id = f.fans_id LEFT JOIN ap_user_follow fw ON fw.follow_id = f.fans_id AND fw.user_id = #{localID} WHERE f.user_id =#{userId} ORDER BY f.created_time DESC LIMIT #{page},#{size}
